name: anything-llm
description: The best solution for turning private documents into a chat bot using off-the-shelf tools and commercially viable AI technologies.
author: Timothy Carambat (Mintplex Labs)

scripts.lint: cd server && yarn lint && cd ../frontend && yarn lint && cd ../embed && yarn lint && cd ../collector && yarn lint
scripts.build-windows: cd server && yarn && cd ../collector && yarn && cd ../frontend && yarn && cd .. && yarn win-setup:envs && yarn prisma:setup
scripts.build-linux: cd server && yarn && cd ../collector && yarn && cd ../frontend && yarn && cd .. && yarn setup:envs && yarn prisma:setup && echo "Please run yarn dev:server, yarn dev:collector, and yarn dev:frontend in separate terminal tabs."
scripts.setup:envs:
cp ./.env.example ./frontend/.env && cp ./.env ./server/.env && cp ./collector/.env.example ./collector/.env && cp ./.env ./docker/.env && echo "All ENV files copied!
"
scripts.win-setup:envs: copy /y .\frontend\.env.example .\frontend\.env && copy /y .\.env .\server\.env && copy /y .\collector\.env.example .\collector\.env && copy /y .\.env .\docker\.env && echo "All ENV files copied!"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:setup: yarn prisma:generate && yarn prisma:migrate && yarn prisma:seed
scripts.prod:frontend: cd frontend && yarn build && rm -rf ../server/public && cp -rf ./dist ../server/public
scripts.win-prod:frontend: cd frontend && yarn build && del /F /S /Q ..\server\public && xcopy /E /I /Y .\dist  ..\server\public
